summary:
The Pac-12 is a college sports conference in the western U.S. It's part of the top level of college sports, NCAA Division I, and its football teams play in the highest division. Currently, only Oregon State and Washington State are members.

The conference was formed in 1959 and has changed names several times, adding Colorado and Utah in 2011. It's known for its success, winning over 500 NCAA championships, more than any other conference. Recently, in 2024, many members left, leaving just two teams until new schools join in 2026.
title: Pac-12 Conference
